4:53 - There's the reason why. Plutonium mines don't exist, and nuclear proliferation concerns are more of an issue with fuel reprocessing than cost, or safety, or anything else for most countries.
In the future if greed doesn't stall it, I believe fusion will be the new source of energy, with "spent" fission products being used as the fuel.
